transcript.text: Good afternoon everyone. I'm excited to share our Q4 sales results with you today.
We exceeded our quarterly target by fifteen percent, bringing in a total revenue of two point eight million dollars.
This represents a twenty-three percent increase compared to the same quarter last year, which is outstanding growth.
Our enterprise segment performed particularly well, with three major contracts signed in December alone.
The small and medium business segment also showed strong performance with a twelve percent increase in monthly recurring revenue.
Looking ahead to Q1, we have a solid pipeline of opportunities and I'm confident we can maintain this momentum.
Thank you to the entire sales team for their hard work and dedication. Now I'll open the floor for questions.
Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions after this meeting.
